catalog_info.title: Transformational Immunology
catalog_info.description: This is a reading course which will chose 7 papers that changed the field of immunology. Each session will consist of a student-led presentation of background on the topic, the paper itself, and the implications which followed.  Depending on enrollment, this may be divided between two students. Each student is expected to make one – two  presentations during the seven-week course. Evaluation is based on presentations and class participation.
